mapper.select: SELECT a.assignee_ FROM act_hi_actinst a JOIN act_ru_task b ON b.id_ = a.task_id_ WHERE act_type_ = 'userTask' AND b.proc_inst_id_ = #{instanceId}

SELECT a.task_id_ AS taskId, a.act_name_ AS taskName, a.proc_def_id_ AS definitionId, a.proc_inst_id_ AS processInstanceId, #{dto.username} AS assigneeName, a.start_time_ AS createTime, b.task_def_key_ AS taskDefinitionKey, d.name_ AS processName, c.name_ AS processInstanceName, c.BUSINESS_KEY_ as businessKey FROM act_hi_actinst a join act_ru_task b on a.task_id_ = b.id_ join act_ru_execution c on a.proc_inst_id_ = c.proc_inst_id_ join act_re_procdef d on d.id_ = a.proc_def_id_ where a.assignee_ = #{dto.userId} and b.suspension_state_ = 1 and a.act_type_ = 'userTask' and c.business_key_ <> '' and c.name_ <> '' and d.key_ = #{dto.processKey} and d.name_ like concat('%',#{dto.processName},'%') ORDER BY a.start_time_ DESC
